story:
Story of My Book

Reality Check - In Pursuit of the Right Questions


My name is Carlo Mahfouz, and I am the author of Reality Check - In Pursuit of the Right Questions. I wrote this book because I recognized that the challenge we face in today's very uncertain world full of ambiguity and distractions from every angle is "How to tackle what matters?" But more importantly, how to actually see it in the first place. If we can train ourselves to ask the right questions, we can see things differently and ultimately create positive change in the world.

My hope is that, in reading this book, you will discover how you can better prepare yourself to ask the right questions. In this book, I hope to instill in you the same sort of passion and excitement that I have for exploring the characteristics, mental models, mindsets, and behaviors that enable us to improve and better equip ourselves to tackle problems with the right questions. Ultimately, I want you to see this book as a tool to help you navigate today's world filled with uncertainty and distractions, whether it is on a personal or professional level. That will give you a structure to lean into to ground your thinking as you explore questions that matter to you the most. 

In this book, you'll learn about what elements we should be conscious of when asking questions, such as context, time, and energy. Dive into internal challenges to measure and deal with ambiguity, extremes, and idea ownership. Moving into communication and addressing the external challenges and setting expectations, having the right audience, and speaking the same language. You'll hear stories such as...

  • My personal story, as an engineer, computer graphics artist, and opera singer. Leveraging different mental models from various disciplines to structure and understand what it takes to ask the right questions. 
  • Ola Helland’s story of when his Dad got Alzheimer and how embracing and accepting the change, even though it was a really bad change, made him deal with it differently. Asking the right questions hinges on the understanding that everything is changing constantly and that we have to accept that. 
  • Lucas Huang’s story about idea ownership. The right questions are the ones that expose ideas and challenge the ownership and disputes them fiercely to find the best solutions.

 

You will love this book if you want to grow and challenge yourself to ask better questions.

Reality Check - In Pursuit Of The Right Questions is a nonfiction book that speaks to leaders, entrepreneurs, and innovators who want to look at things differently and challenge the status quo to find solutions that address what matters through asking the right questions.

 

The Book - Reality Check - In Pursuit Of The Right Questions

The book is written in three parts.

Part 1 contains the introduction + chapters 1-5, which define and describe the elements which we should be conscious of when asking questions. Such as accepting change and our relationship with it while recognizing the right question alongside context and energy. 

Part 2 contains chapters 6-10, which dive into embracing ambiguity mindset, removing the filters of idea ownership, and teasing the extremes to identify the boundaries.

Part 3 contains chapters 11-14, which focus on communication and how to frame and set up good conversations which enable good questions and interactions. 

 

What I Need & What You'll Get

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:

 

  • The editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in December 2021.
  • The cover design of my book. (The mockups you see currently are a placeholder!)
  • The layout design for the interior of my book (physical copy, ebook formats).
  • The copy editing for my book to polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication.
  • The launch & promotion efforts for my book when I ultimately publish this fall.

 

When I pre-sell 120 copies of my book, I will publish a paperback and ebook.

When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book, I will also publish a hardcover edition.

When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover edition and an audiobook.

I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:

  • You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish it.
  • Your name will appear in the Acknowledgments section of my book.
  • You will receive early access to the Introduction and other excerpts from my book, with the opportunity to review them and give me early feedback.
  • You will have the opportunity to be involved in selecting my cover and title.
  • You will be invited to join my Author Community and get behind-the-scenes sneak peeks into the publishing process.
  • And much more!
 

About the Author

Carlo Mahfouz is an intrapreneur in the healthcare Ed-tech space working at Laerdal Medical, developing products for healthcare providers to help improve patient outcomes and survival. He is a firm believer in technology's power to help save lives and create positive change globally. Carlo is also a novice opera singer heading innovation at Lyrica Classic, a classical music non-profit company. Carlo has a BS from Notre Dame University in Lebanon and an MBA from Georgetown University.

Carlo wrote this book because he believes that we can be better prepared to address the problems which matter. If 2020 has taught anything, we are more than capable of solving any problem as long as we are willing to ask the right questions and be prepared.  

Carlo enjoys hiking, drawing, singing, photography, and playing his classical guitar to unwind. Always curious, Carlo is constantly challenging himself and others to learn and explore new things. 

For more information, you can connect with Carlo at carlomahfouz.com and on LinkedIn and Instagram.

 

International Preorders

For international preorders, please do the following:
  • Identify the perk that interests you, e.g. 1 or 2 paperbacks
  • Select the pink "Back it" button to "Make a contribution" for the same amount (this choice bypasses the shipping address page)
  • Use this form to share your mailing address, so I can calculate the international shipping costs and invoice you for that amount via PayPal/Venmo
 

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by including the cost of mailing and shipping the signed copies into each pre-order tier. 

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we ship the pre-order rewards to you as early as possible. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as to when my book will publish. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.
 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Please share my pre-sale campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family, and network. Please use #realitycheckbook #problem-solving #personalgrowth and tag me(@carlomahfouz_) as well as my publisher, New Degree Press, so that we can help amplify your efforts.
  • You can easily share my pre-sale campaign via Indiegogo at the top of the page.
  • Please share my book with 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it via text or direct message on social media.

 

Thank you so much for all of your love and support!

Thanks again,
Carlo Mahfouz

story:
La nostra Storia

Siamo Marilia, Andrea, Valentina,  mamme da 3 nazioni diverse, Brasile , Messico e Italia,  e con tre diversi percorsi accademici e specializzazioni.

Dal 2017 stiamo lavorando in questo progetto, tante piccole storie racchiuse in un albo illustrato con una bella lettura in rima per bambini di età 3-7 anni presentata in diverse lingue.

Questa campagna mira a far conoscere "Paco e i suoi amici" tramite un canale you tube per poi farlo diventare a tutti gli effetti un piccolo libro.

I video saranno  animati con i personaggi del libro con canzoni in diverse lingue  facili e allegre così che il bambino possa ascoltare musicalità di linguaggio differenti e passare momenti sereni durante la giornata.

Vogliamo fare qualcosa che vada oltre al solo libro,creando un compagno di avventure per tutte le attività che ci piacerebbe condividere con voi (tutorial, canzoni, storie) .

I personaggi di "Paco e i suoi amici"  sono fatti interamente partendo da carta colorata e forbice, direttamente dalla fantasia di Marilia, ideatrice dei personaggi e del progetto.

OUR HISTORY

We are Marilia, Andrea, Valentina, mothers from 3 different countries, Brazil, Mexico and Italy, and with three different academic courses and specializations.

Since 2017 we are working on this project, small stories contained in an illustrated book that has a beautiful reading in rhymes for children aged 3-7 presented in different languages.

This campaign aims to make "Paco and friends" known through a you tube channel and then make it become a small book.

The videos will be animated with the characters of the book with songs in different languages easy and cheerful so that the child can listen to different musicalities and spend quiet moments during the day.

We want to do something that goes beyond just the book, creating a companion of adventures for all the activities that we would like to share with you (tutorials, songs, stories).

The characters of "Paco and friends" are made entirely from colored paper and scissors, directly from the imagination of Marilia, creator of the characters and the project.

 

Di cosa abbiamo bisogno?

Per poter concretizzare questo progetto ci serve il vostro contributo! e questo per:

  • fare il canale Youtube di Paco
  • pagare il nostro web-designer
  • iniziare a raccogliere fondi per la pubblicazione

WHAT WE NEED

To make this project real we need your help! and this for:

  • make the you-tube Channel
  • pay our web-designer
  • start raising funds for publication

 

Cosa trasmette Paco

"Paco e i suoi amici" mette in rilievo la cultura delle piccole comunità intorno al mondo, il valore dell'inclusione, della scoperta e l'arricchimento di altri modi di essere.

Paco sarà un ambasciatore di valori importanti (l'amicizia, il rispetto, l'accoglienza e l'accettazione) per i bambini che fin da piccoli entrano con semplicità a contatto con una realtà multiculturale.

WHAT PACO TRANSMITS

"Paco and friends" highlights the culture of small communities around the world, the value of inclusion, of discovery and enrichment of other ways of being.

Paco will be an ambassador of important values (friendship, respect, acceptance and family) for children who, from an early age, easily enter into contact with a multicultural reality.

 

Rischi e sfide

I rischio è che la piattaforma multimediale non abbia un grande riscontro e che il progetto venga limitato alla parte cartacea, il libro, a cui comunque crediamo molto e che per questo verrà portata a termine. Siamo per questo in contatto con vari editori e il nostro obiettivo è di stampare il libro , se non per Natale, per il 2019.

RISKS AND CHALLENGES

The risk is that the multimedia platform does not have a great response and that the project is limited to the paper part, the book, to which we still believe a lot and for this will be completed. We are therefore in contact with various publishers and our goal is to print the book, if not for Christmas, for 2019.

 

Modi in cui ci puoi aiutare

Ti ringraziamo enormemente se avrai la voglia e il piacere di sostenerci con una, anche piccola, donazione, condividendo il progetto tramite social, passaparola , e mandandoci energia positiva!

Condividete , condividete, condividete!

HOW YOU CAN HELP US

We thank you immensely if you have the desire and the pleasure of supporting us with a, even small, donation, sharing the project through social, word of mouth, and sending us positive energy!

Share, share, share!

Grazie di Cuore!

Marilia, Andrea, Valentina
story_txt:
La nostra Storia
Siamo Marilia, Andrea, Valentina,  mamme da 3 nazioni diverse, Brasile , Messico e Italia,  e con tre diversi percorsi accademici e specializzazioni.
Dal 2017 stiamo lavorando in questo progetto, tante piccole storie racchiuse in un albo illustrato con una bella lettura in rima per bambini di età 3-7 anni presentata in diverse lingue.
Questa campagna mira a far conoscere "Paco e i suoi amici" tramite un canale you tube per poi farlo diventare a tutti gli effetti un piccolo libro.
I video saranno  animati con i personaggi del libro con canzoni in diverse lingue  facili e allegre così che il bambino possa ascoltare musicalità di linguaggio differenti e passare momenti sereni durante la giornata.
Vogliamo fare qualcosa che vada oltre al solo libro,creando un compagno di avventure per tutte le attività che ci piacerebbe condividere con voi (tutorial, canzoni, storie) .
I personaggi di "Paco e i suoi amici"  sono fatti interamente partendo da carta colorata e forbice, direttamente dalla fantasia di Marilia, ideatrice dei personaggi e del progetto.
OUR HISTORY
We are Marilia, Andrea, Valentina, mothers from 3 different countries, Brazil, Mexico and Italy, and with three different academic courses and specializations.Since 2017 we are working on this project, small stories contained in an illustrated book that has a beautiful reading in rhymes for children aged 3-7 presented in different languages.This campaign aims to make "Paco and friends" known through a you tube channel and then make it become a small book.The videos will be animated with the characters of the book with songs in different languages easy and cheerful so that the child can listen to different musicalities and spend quiet moments during the day.
We want to do something that goes beyond just the book, creating a companion of adventures for all the activities that we would like to share with you (tutorials, songs, stories).The characters of "Paco and friends" are made entirely from colored paper and scissors, directly from the imagination of Marilia, creator of the characters and the project.
 

Di cosa abbiamo bisogno?
Per poter concretizzare questo progetto ci serve il vostro contributo! e questo per:

fare il canale Youtube di Paco
pagare il nostro web-designer
iniziare a raccogliere fondi per la pubblicazione

WHAT WE NEED
To make this project real we need your help! and this for:

make the you-tube Channel
pay our web-designer
start raising funds for publication

 

Cosa trasmette Paco
"Paco e i suoi amici" mette in rilievo la cultura delle piccole comunità intorno al mondo, il valore dell'inclusione, della scoperta e l'arricchimento di altri modi di essere.
Paco sarà un ambasciatore di valori importanti (l'amicizia, il rispetto, l'accoglienza e l'accettazione) per i bambini che fin da piccoli entrano con semplicità a contatto con una realtà multiculturale.
WHAT PACO TRANSMITS
"Paco and friends" highlights the culture of small communities around the world, the value of inclusion, of discovery and enrichment of other ways of being.Paco will be an ambassador of important values (friendship, respect, acceptance and family) for children who, from an early age, easily enter into contact with a multicultural reality.

 
Rischi e sfide
I rischio è che la piattaforma multimediale non abbia un grande riscontro e che il progetto venga limitato alla parte cartacea, il libro, a cui comunque crediamo molto e che per questo verrà portata a termine. Siamo per questo in contatto con vari editori e il nostro obiettivo è di stampare il libro , se non per Natale, per il 2019.
RISKS AND CHALLENGES
The risk is that the multimedia platform does not have a great response and that the project is limited to the paper part, the book, to which we still believe a lot and for this will be completed. We are therefore in contact with various publishers and our goal is to print the book, if not for Christmas, for 2019.

 
Modi in cui ci puoi aiutare
Ti ringraziamo enormemente se avrai la voglia e il piacere di sostenerci con una, anche piccola, donazione, condividendo il progetto tramite social, passaparola , e mandandoci energia positiva!
Condividete , condividete, condividete!
HOW YOU CAN HELP US
We thank you immensely if you have the desire and the pleasure of supporting us with a, even small, donation, sharing the project through social, word of mouth, and sending us positive energy!Share, share, share!
Grazie di Cuore!Marilia, Andrea, Valentina

story:
The book is about how energy storage and virtual power plants will increase the sustainability, affordability, and resiliency of the electrical grid. I wrote it because the current electrical grid needs work to include more renewable energy. Publishing in February 2020.
 

Virtual Power is about how energy storage and virtual power plants will enable the electrical grid to increase sustainability, affordability, and resiliency.


My name is Will Angel and I am the author of Virtual Power. I wrote this book because we’re facing a global challenge to make humanity’s presence on this planet sustainable. Advances in energy storage and Internet of Things networking will make the global electrical grids more sustainable and resilient to the effects of climate change.

In Virtual Power you will discover how energy storage and virtual power plants are enabling more renewable energy production and increasing the resiliency of our power networks without breaking the bank. You’ll learn about the amazing work being done with renewable energy to decarbonize the electrical grid, and how those efforts are succeeding, but not succeeding fast enough without storage.

In this book, I hope to instill the same sort of passion and excitement that I have for energy technology and policy in you and help inform your personal, business, and policy decisions.

In this book, you'll learn about:
  • How Grid Scale energy storage in Australia is keeping the lights on and reducing costs.
  • The Duck Curve: how virtual power plants made out of charging electric vehicles are keeping solar energy from destroying California’s electrical grid.
  • How businesses and governments are saving billions of dollars by investing in flexibility and storage.
You will love this book if you are passionate about sustainability and the environment or enjoy learning about technology.

Virtual Power is a non-fiction book for environmental activists and decision makers in utilities, businesses, and governments, and anyone interested in energy storage, virtual power plants, and the future of human electricity consumption.
 

The Book - Virtual Power

The book is written in 5 Parts....

Part 1 contains the introduction + additional chapters. This part will cover our current situation with climate change and how this is a challenge for human energy consumption, a brief history of energy and how we got here, how we’re dependent on energy, and the ways that renewable energy gives us hope.

Part 2 contains Chapters 5-8. This part will cover what renewables we have, how they’ll help, how they won’t be enough to fully decarbonize our grid, and how storage is the solution.

Part 3 contains Chapters 9-13. This section will look at how the electrical grid needs to be more flexible, how energy storage helps, the ways in which demand response works and fails to work, how virtual power plants are going to be a huge part of the grid, and how the blockchain could save or destroy us.

Part 4 contains chapters 14-17. This portion explores the obstacles facing energy storage and virtual power plants, including an overview of how costs, regulation, social norms, and the technology itself will make it difficult to use energy storage effectively.

Part 5 contains chapters 18-20. This conclusion to my book looks at the future of human energy consumption and where we could be in 10 to 50 years.
 

What I Need & What You'll Get


Virtual Power will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:

The Editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in February 2020!

The Cover Design of my Book - the mockups you see currently are a placeholder!

The Layout Design for the interior of my book (Physical Copy, Ebook Formats)

The Copyediting for My Book - to help polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication

The Launch & Promotion Efforts for Virtual Power

When I pre-sell 150 copies of Virtual Power, I will also publish an audiobook. When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover edition.


I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now. When I publish, you will receive:

A personally signed copy of Virtual Power

A personal, handwritten thank you note for pre-ordering Virtual Power

Your Name will appear in a Special, Acknowledgements Section of Virtual Power (“with Special Thanks to”)

Early access to the Introduction of Virtual Power and my entire manuscript, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback

The opportunity to be involved in selecting my cover

I will do a book topic/workshop seminar where I will share my experiences writing Virtual Power,  or any similar topic!

And more...

About the Author

William Angel is a Data Analyst at Knowledge To Practice and helps organize the DC Data Visualization Meetup group. He has a BA in Philosophy from Georgetown University where he studied Bioethics, Physics, and entrepreneurship. He is passionate about energy technology and the challenges of making our presence on this planet sustainable, and wrote this book to help publicize the rapid developments occurring in energy storage technology and business practices. He has a pet bearded dragon and enjoys DIY electronics, data visualization, reading books, and strategy video games.

For more information you can connect with William through email at buildingwill@gmail.com, linkedin at https://www.linkedin.com/in/william-angel/ and Twitter at @DataDrivenAngel https://twitter.com/DataDrivenAngel

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by building into the campaign the mailing and shipping costs of your signed copies to you within each pre-order tier.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we get the earliest possible ship date of the signed book copy to you. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as Virtual Power hits each key milestone and publishes. You will know when the copies of Virtual Power you pre-ordered are expected to ship.

Other Ways You Can Help

 

Please Share my Pre-sale Campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family and network. Use #Virtualpowerbook and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press so we can help amplify your efforts.

You can also share this Pre-Sale Campaign Page via Indiegogo at the top of the page

Thank you so much for all of your encouragement and support!

Cheers,
Will

story:
Noi coordinatori di Millennials Press siamo sostanzialmente ragazzi, giovani laureati e comunicatori, soprattutto curiosi e appassionati di giornalismo. Prima di millennialspress.com abbiamo gestito e fatto fiorire Tribuna Italia, un successo per l’editoria giovanile in Italia. Adesso ci impegniamo a reperire informazioni e trasmetterle senza filtri, nel rispetto del lettore. Per far definitivamente decollare il nostro giornale abbiamo bisogno di voi. Banale, no? Eppure per fare del buon giornalismo online sono sufficienti investimenti contenuti ma oculati. Ci concentreremo particolarmente sullo sviluppo di una piattaforma sempre più responsive e user-friendly. Ma investiremo anche nella pianificazione di campagne social innovative, nella creazione di una app e nella programmazione di eventi con un'importante valenza sociale. Andando per ordine, pensiamo di dover rispettivamente impegnare cifre pari a: 

1) 3000 euro per dare un importante boost ai profili social di Millennials Press (attraverso campagne a pagamento sui differenti canali sui quali siamo presenti). 

2) 1500 euro per la progettazione di una app che possa essere per gli utenti un utile strumento. 

3) 2500 euro per finanziare cinque incontri afferenti ad un unico tema scelto dal Comitato di Redazione. 

Abbiamo deciso di non porre l'asticella oltre i 10.000 euro perché, come già anticipato, per emergere utilizzando il potentissimo strumento a cui ora siete connessi per leggerci basta poco. Il cartaceo è morto, non stamperemo nulla. Ciò che vi offriamo, invece, è un magazine in digitale molto elaborato e dai contenuti per metà esclusivi. Il resto sarà un best-of di quanto pubblicato su millennialspress.com nel mese precedente. Il costo della realizzazione grafica di una rivista online si aggira attorno ai 1000/1200. Facendo una donazione più corposa potrà avere anche una t-shirt personalizzata, con la caratteristica M di Millennials sul petto ed il logo di testata sulle spalle. E se sfortunatamente non dovessimo raggiungere la cifra che ci siamo prefissi, saremo costretti a tagliare le iniziative di guerilla marketing per cui sarebbero imprescindibile investimenti su cose fisiche. 

A questo punto Indiegogo ci chiede di spiegarvi perché il nostro progetto è importante per il mondo. Il mondo. Sì, beh, è vero anche che abbiamo un sito gemello negli States, a Washington, ma per ora i nostri pur ambiziosi obiettivi sono circoscritti al rendere l'Italia un paese migliore. Partendo dal basso. E se è vero come è vero che un Paese è reso grande dalle persone che vi abitano, abbiamo bisogno di fare un salto di qualità nell'informazione e rendere il servizio pubblico a cui sono chiamati i giornalisti. A cui siamo chiamati noi giornalisti. Eppure, c'è qualcosa che non va. Ve lo spieghiamo prendendo a prestito uno stralcio della mission pubblicata su millennialspress.com: «Dobbiamo metaforicamente uccidere il giornalista, seppellirlo e ricreare i contorni di una professione investita di un cruciale ruolo sociale. Reinventarsi partendo da zero ci sembra una missione quantomai attraente e complicata, ma soprattutto necessaria». Un po' forte, no? Però ci piace osare. Cambiando discorso, vi accennavamo di Tribuna Italia. Ecco, appunto: di noi potete fidarvi, sappiamo come fare ed in passato, puntando soprattutto sul capitale umano, con il nostro team di giovani giornalisti agguerriti siamo riusciti ad ottenere un notevole livello di scrittura. Purtroppo però, dopo quasi tre anni di attività e pubblicazioni serrate, Tribuna Italia è scomparso dal web a causa del mancato rinnovo del dominio da parte del nostro ex editore. Dalle ceneri del precedente esperimento editoriale nasce l'internazionale e più ambizioso Millennials Press. Nell'ultimo anno di Tribuna Italia, continuando sugli stessi ritmi avremmo raggiunto 1.5 milioni di click. Senza investire un centesimo nei social, senza aver mai ricevuto un rimborso spese o niente del genere. Non male, in fondo. Ma non siamo soliti accontentarci e con MP vogliamo almeno raddoppiare in un tempo minore. 

D'altra parte, ci dispiace ammetterlo, ma sinceramente il raggiungimento di risultati così ambiziosi non dipende unicamente da noi. Non scopriamo l'America dicendo che il web offre numerose opportunità a bassi costi, perciò in molti hanno intrapreso questa strada e la concorrenza è feroce. Nonostante tutto, ci siamo ripromessi di aprire nuove strade, camminando fuori dai sentieri convenzionali. Questo potrà certamente aiutarci. 

Per noi è importante che il maggior numero di persone legga questo scritto. Capiremo chi di voi non avrà la possibilità materiale di contribuire ma sarà comunque interessato ad aiutarci. Perciò fate rumore online, condividete e fate condividere, mettete like alla pagina Fb, aiutateci a creare engagement su Twitter. Chiamateci in causa per spiegazioni, confronti e, se ne avrete voglia, ispirateci ad andare oltre. 

Un sentito grazie, 

#WeMillennials

story:
Welcome!


What people are saying about Rock'n'Roll Unravelled

"You can trace the roads we've traveled                                                                                         Here in Rock'n'Roll Unravelled!                                                                                                         Well researched and informative as hell!"                                                                                                   Dennis Locorriere (Dr Hook) ~


NEW, NEW: Be the 1st Person in YOUR Country to Buy a Copy of Rock'n'Roll Unravelled and Receive a Unique Dedication

If you are the first person in your country to buy a copy, not only will it be signed by the author but it will also be unique, in that it will have a dedication as the first book sold in that country.

Australia: "First copy of Rock'n'Roll Unravelled in Japan - To Tom Dooley"

Countries already sold to:

  • UK
  • America
  • Australia
BUY NOW for your dedication and make YOUR book UNIQUE!


Why Did I Write Rock'n'Roll Unravelled?

I looked for a long time for a book that told the story of rock'n'roll, from its roots in the blues, to punk rock in the mid-1970s. I also wanted to know about the  influences outside the music, the Vietnam War, the Civil Rights struggle, the Cold War and the many other factors that had a major influence on the music of the 1950s, '60s and '70s.  

The book I was searching for quite clearly did not exist so I decided to write it myself.  Over seven years of meticulous research later - Rock’n’Roll Unravelled is here!


Rock'n Roll Teasers      (more below...)

The answers can all be found in Rock'n'Roll Unravelled...

1. Which American DJ is accredited with coining the phrase "rock'n'roll"?

2. Who recorded the original version of Twist and Shout?  (Clue: it was produced by Phil Spector and it was not the Beatles or the Isley Brothers.)

3. Which punk band released both the first UK punk single and the first UK punk album? 


What Is Rock'n'Roll Unravelled About?

Rock’n’Roll Unravelled's 700 pages tell the story of rock'n'roll, from its roots in gospel, blues, jazz, R&B and country, up until it turned full circle with punk rock in the mid-1970s.  Punk took the music back to its roots of two-minute songs, played by non-virtuoso musicians in small, intimate venues.  The book includes the music scenes on both sides of the Atlantic and also traces the growth of British rock'n'roll through trad jazz and skiffle.

As well as the music, Rock’n’Roll Unravelled looks at the outside events that helped to shape the sounds of the time, the Vietnam War, the Civil Rights struggle, the Cold War and many others.

There is a wealth of information in Rock'n'Roll Unravelled, including:

  • Notable gigs and lineups - where the musicians came from when they joined and went to when they left.
  • Recording sessions, albums and singles: originals, covers, writers, producers; the story behind the song
  • Some of rock'n'roll's might-have-been moments: failed auditions, 'lost' albums, plagiarism, litigation
  • Famous TV, movie and theatre performances
  • Rock'n'Roll high jinks and mayhem - includes Led Zeppelin's Mud Shark Incident, Alice Cooper and the chicken, Ozzy Osbourne and that bat!  
  • Rock'n'Roll landmarks
  • Births and deaths - 27 Club 
  • Background to how the likes of The Beatles, Led Zeppelin, The Rolling Stones and Pink Floyd came together
  • An artist's band history
  • Groundbreaking producers: Phil Spector, Sam Phillips, Joe Meek +++
  • PLUS the events that shaped the music...
  • Vietnam War: the story, from Dien Bien Phu to the fall of Saigon 
  • Civil Rights: landmark events, Rosa Parks, Schoolhouse Door stand +++
  • Cold War: Bay of Pigs, Cuban Crisis, McCarthy witch hunts +++
  • Assassinations: Kennedy brothers, Martin Luther King
  • Social and political events: Rivers of Blood speech, Che Guevare's death 
  • AND SO MUCH MORE...
This is 700 jam-packed pages of the life and times of rock'n'roll! 

 

The Book has a Unique Three-Part Structure 

Rock’n’Roll Unravelled's unique three-part structure brings the music, lives and times of the 1950s, '60s and '70s vividly to life.    

  • PART 1: Timeline
  • PART 2: What Happened Today?
  • PART 3: Pocket Histories
PART 1: Timeline 

The Timeline gives a chronological listing for all of the events described in Part 2, What Happened Today?  It provides a perspective and enables the observer to read between rock’n’roll’s lines. Discover what else was happening around the time that, say, the Beatles released their debut single Love Me Do in the UK on 5 October 1962.  (Amongst other things, we stood at the very brink of World War III and nuclear annihilation!)  See careers wax and wane, as musical genres move from one to another.  The Timeline includes many singles, albums, covers and originals, providing a soundtrack of the era.

PART 2: What Happened Today?

Set in a day-by-day, January to December format, What Happened Today? recounts gigs, record releases, recording sessions, band backgrounds, birthdays, deaths, festivals, movies, ‘lost’ albums, failed auditions, plagiarism, literary landmarks, famous TV appearances, infamous rock’n’roll events, such as Led Zeppelin’s notorious Mud Shark Incident (28 July 1969), and much, much more.

PART 3: Pocket Histories
A comprehensive cross-referencing of the people, bands and events in What Happened Today? can be found in Pocket Histories.  It also includes: band histories for individuals; backstories of how the major bands came together; lineups at particular gigs, often with additional information about where musicians came from or went to when they joined or moved on, and much, much more.

I currently make a regular monthly appearance as a guest on Meridian FM, in Dave Roberts's Music for Grown Ups radio show.  The topics vary and have so far included: how Cream came together, the Stiff Records story, David Bowie's career and the rise and fall of American rock'n'roll.  My next appearance is on 28 April, a litttle after 8.00 pm.  This week's topic is the Undreground Scene of the mid-late 1960s, please join me on http://www.meridianfm.com/

story:
Less than 2 days to meet our funding needs!

Thanks to our core circle of friends and students, we have raised almost enough funds for editing.

We still have a long way to go to pay for graphics, printing and advertising.

Please contribute generously and share this campaign to help us meet our funding goals.

Check out the draft cover! 

3D image created by my son Iain Barrett Byrnes.  Design by Mark Gerardi.  Mark will be adding roots, nature images and power animals to this design to depict the balance required to live a tantra lifestyle. 

Please donate generously, so we can proceed with this exciting project.  Be part of bringing something that is needed to the world.  Thank you!

News about the fundraising campaign...

We have a very special publishing team on board!

Mark Gerardi has agreed to illustrate the book.  Mark has a long career in graphic design, as well as sharing qi gong, reiki and shamanism in his community.  I chose Mark because I know his spiritual practice will infuse the cover and illustrations he will be creating for the book.  He also has a strong interest in deepening his knowledge of tantra by illustrating the visual transformational journey. www.luminousandhealthy.com

Heather Perkins has agreed to do the final editing of the book.  Heather has many years of professional editing experience and also lives a spiritual lifestyle.  Heather and I often encourage each other to "meditate on it".  She will be meditating before each editing session.  http://mysteriousartemis.com

Each chapter of the book was channeled after meditation or an extended practice.  I am grateful to have gathered a team who will offer the finishing touches in the same fashion.

Mark and Heather are waiting in the wings for the funding we need to begin.  

We appreciate all the "shares" and feel your support.  

We still have quite a way to go to meet our funding needs of $5000.  

Please donate any amount you can spare to help get the momentum going.  Continue to share the link below and offer as much financial support as you can to bring this book to the world by Spring 2014.


My name is Prana Regina Barrett and I have written the book Lighter. Living Tantra.


I wrote this book because, over the past 4 years, while sharing Tantra to Love™ workshops worldwide, I have seen a growing interest in the general public to learn Tantra and incorporate these practices into daily life.


As a lifelong Tantra practitioner, I have experienced the highs of coming into one’s fullest potential, as well as the lows when one feels exposed and vulnerable.  Both are part of the transformational journey of returning back to the True Self. 


You see, Tantra practices, done ongoing and adopted as as a holistic lifestyle, reopen energy centers within the body, also known as chakras.  This is a positive and therapeutic experience and can also leave the practitioner feeling vulnerable and confused at times.  


As the body loosens around chakras, through movement, meditation, sound, breath and bodywork, the Tantra practitioner can become childlike and vulnerable.  Simultaneously, the practitioner must practice techniques that keep her grounded and assist her in living in a new way that is supportive and allows the True Self, one's true identity, to thrive.


Lighter.  Living Tantra guides the Tantra practitioner through this transformational journey and provides supportive techniques for coming into ones fullest potential, true purpose and to live out one's unique destiny.


Examples of the techniques suggested in the book include a Kriya style 3rd eye meditation to raise energy and a Taoist gold ball meditation for grounding energy.   As readers are guided to share their true identity with others, they will find the chapters on communication and sharing energy very helpful.


The book is accessible to all and is written for those who are curious about Tantra and others who are on the path and interested in supplemental guidance.


It will be a recommended resource to all our students, of all ages and from around the world, who are seeking spiritual and sacred connection with themselves and others.


Here are a sample list of the chapters...


Why Choose a Tantra Lifestyle?


Self Love


Transforming The Ego


Clear, Honest and Loving Communication


Sharing Energy


May I have sparked your interest enough to, now, talk about how you can support the book's publication.  I would appreciate any support you can provide.  Today, I am beginning my Indietogogo fundraising campaign for a conservative amount of $5000, which will help to cover editing, illustration and publishing costs, as well as to pay for some effective advertising.   Tantra to Love™ is absorbing all time spent writing and any additional marketing costs required.  


I am setting my fundraising goal at $5000, so I meet my intention and receive the highest percentage of funds raised.  If I exceed my fundraising goal, even better!  Please offer your support in any amount.  Your generosity is appreciated.  Check out some of the investment incentives being offered for certain donation levels.


We would like the book to be ready for distribution at our upcoming annual Spring retreat at Kripalu Center for Yoga and Health scheduled for late March 2014.


Less than 2 days remaining to meet our funding needs, so please don't delay in making your donation.


Thank you for your support in bringing these teachings to the world in paper and Ebook form.  It will be available on Amazon.com, in local book stores and in academic settings, available to all who are guided to read it.


If you would like to read the book blog, which contains a few sample chapters: Self Love (7/13/12) and Tantra Lifestyle for Healing and Transformation (4/18/12), visit www.tantratolove.com/blog. The book has received support from some of my main teachers: Sylvia Brallier of Tantric Shamanism Mystery School, Michael Lee, founder of Phoenix Rising Yoga Therapy and Ann Carroll, my Qi Gong Teacher.  They have all made contributions to the blog, along with other colleagues and students.  Enjoy reading and please join the conversation.  We enjoy your comments.


About the Author


Prana (Regina Barrett), BS, MIA, ERYT, CYT is the founder, lead tantra educator and yoga therapist at Tantra to Love™ and author of her soon to be published book Lighter.  Living Tantra.  Prana founded the Tantra to Love™ Lifestyle Mastery Program.  She has created the audio pod casts Self Love: Gentle and Restorative Asana Flows with Photos of Poses.  Prana shares a tantra yoga, shamanic and qi gong path, while creating a safe container for physical and emotional transformation.


Prana has been facilitating engaging workshops for over 30 years. She and her husband John Rene Berard share a private practice and school called Tantra to Love™, offering private sessions, workshops, sacred union ceremonies and retreats world wide. 


Prana has been published in periodicals including Many Hands, Loving More Magazine and Elephant Journal.  In Fall 2012, she was interviewed, alongside other internationally known tantra educators, as part of the Ignite your Heart Transform your Relationship Telesummit.  She was also interviewed for Dispatch Magazine this Spring and an article was written and published about her journey as an author of this book.


Please use the share tools to help spread the word.  Thanks you SO much for your support.

We still have a long way to go to pay for graphics, printing and advertising.
Please contribute generously and share this campaign to help us meet our funding goals.
Check out the draft cover! 
3D image created by my son Iain Barrett Byrnes.  Design by Mark Gerardi.  Mark will be adding roots, nature images and power animals to this design to depict the balance required to live a tantra lifestyle. 
Please donate generously, so we can proceed with this exciting project.  Be part of bringing something that is needed to the world.  Thank you!

story:
Thanks to this campaign, we have:

Released the 2014 Edition of the book...  

More than double in size from the first edition, greatly expanded, completely updated, professionally edited and illustrated. 

Get it at:

http://www.rvmobileinternet.com/book

We have created a brand new RV Mobile Internet Resource Center to help keep RVers up to date on news and information, to keep the book living beyond publication.. check it out at:

http://www.rvmobileinternet.com

We have also launched and are accepting members into our premium membership group called 'Mobile Internet Aficionados' at:

http://www.rvmobileinternet.com/membership

 

Thank you again for your belief in us.. this has been an amazing summer since we launched this campaign, completely focused on writing this book and launching this new resource!! We could not have done it without your support!!


The Original Campaign:

We are Chris Dunphy and Cherie Ve Ard, full time 'Technomads' who blog at www.technomadia.com - living and working on the road full time since 2006, mostly as US based RVers. 

Our primary career is application development, technology consulting, and advising. We depend on mobile internet to work remotely, and have navigated a lot of the technological obstacles over the years. 

With our extensive experience working in the tech industry and journalism, we love combining our passions to share what we've learned to make this obstacle easier for others hitting the road. 

Our lives really are a living laboratory for mobile tech. 

Last year, we started writing a comprehensive blog post about all the options for keeping online while being mobile. From cellular, WiFi, boosting, satellite and more. 

By the time we were part way through the topics, we knew this couldn't be covered in a single post - in needed to be an book. 

And thus, the first edition of The Mobile Internet Handbook was born: 

Despite the book being put together rather last minute, it's been very well received, and positively reviewed by prominent RVers and on Amazon as being a valuable resource for RVers who need to keep online - whether for work, keeping in touch with loved ones, paying bills & routing or even for entertainment.  


Table of contents from the first edition:



As mobile technology is constantly changing, it's time to update the book before it gets too far out of date. 


But we don't want to just update it make it current, we also want to create new content & resources to help more people live vibrant and connected mobile lives.

What We Need & What You Get

We put the first edition together as on a shoestring budget, and as quickly as we could so we could get back to our 'real jobs'. 

This time around, we want to create a better and more comprehensive resource.  

We've been holding off on the update as there's a bunch of new developments 'just around the corner' in mobile internet - from new boosters, new offerings and more.  So while we have the time, we want to see if there is interest in expanded content - not just an update. 

This will take time, and investment of money for graphics, layout and editing. 

If you'd find a resource like this valuable -  we could really use your commitment to pre-buying the book, our services or being an sponsor. This will help us devote the time & resources to make this book be the most awesome it can be. 

Book Costs

The costs we'll incur to create the book include:

  • Graphics: We're working with a graphic designer to create cover art and materials for the book. The initial cost is around $600. There's also been requests for more graphical illustrations throughout the book to make the concepts clearer, each will require time and/or money to create. The more money we raise, the more graphics we can create. 


  • Editing: We'd like to hire a professional editor to make sure the content is grammatically solid. This will cost around $400. 
  • Layout: We want to do it right from the beginning and make sure each edition of the book is formatted properly for PDF, Kindle, iBooks and print.  This will require research, and possible investment in tools and/or consulting with a professional service experienced with book layout.
  • Our Time: With funding, we can fully focus on the re-write instead of other income earning projects.

And if you fund any level that includes a copy of the new eBook, you'll also be given a promo code to get a copy of the current edition now to get you started. It's still relevant, especially if you're willing to read our updated blog content to bring the content up to date. 

Funding Goals

If we can meet our minimum funding goal, we feel that will cover the basic costs to do the re-write right with proper professional graphics, layout and editing.

We'll be able to update the content to reflect the current offerings and integrate in our existing expanded content. 

The book update will include at least updates like: 

  • Millenicom's current offerings
  • Changes in the cellular market in terms of contracts & pricing
  • Alternatives to Millenicom for no-contract cellular data
  • Lots of new 5-band cellular boosters that are just hitting the market, as well as the new FCC regulations for using them
  • Upcoming developments we're keeping our eye on.

If we exceed the goal, we can do even more - more illustrations, more chapters/content and more resources for everyone.

Stretch Goals:

If we exceed our funding goal, we will know that we have the support to spend the time creating the following extra content:

  • Funded! $3,500 - Illustrated Glossary, explaining all of the components of mobile internet in basic terms. 
  • Funded! $4,000 - Installation Tips & Tricks Chapter
  • Funded! $5,000 - Frequencies Explained - We'll go into more techie details and break down how all this wireless stuff works, why cellular frequencies matters, and how you can optimize your systems for them.
  • Funded!  $6,000 - Antennas & Mounting Techniques (featuring Jack Mayer!) - We'll be working with guest author and RV tech guru Jack Mayer to produce a chapter dedicated to antennas, maximizing signal, attaching them to masts or the roof of your RV, and how to keep them securely mounted (and water out!). 
  • Funded!! - “I’m Mobile & Connected!” T-Shirt: We will work with our designer to create a totally awesome T-Shirt that proclaims to the world just how mobile connected you are. If we cross this threshold, this will be added as a new perk - and all supporters over $100 will get this added for free.
  • Funded!!!  $7,500 - Entertainment Expansion - we'll cover more information on alternatives to streaming TV and movies, including satellite TV options, and our recommendations for enjoying media on the road. We'll also cover online gaming on the road!
  • Funded!!!  ---> $9,000 - Crossing Borders Chapters - We'll research and include information on options for US based RVers on crossing into Mexico and Canada to keep connected. 
  • Funded!!! $10,000 - Cell Phones & Plans - In addition to covering cellular data options, we'll also include cellular talk & text information, and cover some of the key factors in selecting your right cellular or smartphone (and we'll keep our Apple-bias tempered!) and some of the top options for plans. 

Premium Membership 

We also want to add an optional premium membership area where we can further help folks understand and keep on top of this vital and constantly changing topic. 

Some of the services we'd love to provide are:

  • Regular expanded and updated content for members - from analysis of news in the industry to reviews of new products & services, specific to how they apply to RVers. Mobile tech changes often, and you'll be in the know and have it explained as to how it impacts you as a traveler. The full content will be released to premium members first. 
  • A forum type area for members, where they can interact with us and other members to get their questions answered. 

  • Additional exclusive member resources - such as video content (how to videos, additional information, product reviews), interactive group chat sessions and other ideas. 

Throughout the last year, we experimented with continuing to write in-depth articles on our blog, and keeping folks updated on relevant topics. You can view all of the resources we created at http://www.technomadia.com/internet , and check out ourMobile Internet for RVers Facebook group where we kept RVers updated on mobile internet options and news.

We hope you'll agree, we have the writing skills, passion and technical expertise to create this unique offering aimed directly at US based RVers.  Now we just need to come up with a clever name for this membership group!

Big News (5/22/2014): We are thrilled to announce that RV Guru Jack Mayer will be participating in the new membership area as a contributor and moderator, bringing another mobile connectivity expert on board! And as a special bonus, anyone who signs up for any perk that includes the premium membership and who buys our book will also get a FREE copy of an eBook we are helping Jack produce on "Building a WiFi Capture Device" - a comprehensive guide for advanced users who want to go beyond what an off-the-shelf WiFiRanger is capable of.


In addition to the time to provide this sort of content - there will also be costs involved with creating the tools to deliver this service, so pre-committed members will go a long way to helping us make this happen.  As well as how many tools we can create upfront. 

Funding Goals:

We have started this service off basic... and immediately. Fund a perk that includes the Premium Membership, and you'll quickly be invited to our new private Facebook group, our member-only newsletter list, and invited to occasional member only video casts to bring you up to date on mobile internet topics (before the new book comes out!). 

However, your start date for the membership will be when we officially launch the new book - so you'll be getting bonus months by pre-signing up!

Once we reach at least 100 members pre-signed up, We have triggered investing funds to develop a member only area of our website with more robust functionality & interaction, and devote even more time to creating exclusive content regularly. 

The Impact

We're going to at least update the book, whether or not this campaign gets funded.

That's a given. This is a resource that many RVers appreciate, and we've gotten enough positive feedback that we're inspired to keep the content at least updated.  This is stuff we're passionate about, and speaks to our hearts.


With your support we can do even more to help you and our mobile communities stay connected on the road. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you don't need a new copy of the book, or can't spare the funds right now to help us out - there are other ways you can show your support!

Other ways you can help out:

  • Have a service or expertise that might be able to help us jumpstart this project?  We're always open to bartering services or accepting other forms of sponsorship, instead of cash influx. We could use layout assistance, technical illustrations, marketing help, etc.
  • Have a related product or service you'd like considered for inclusion in our book or content? Be in touch, we are open to receiving review products. 
  • And of course, help us spread the word!  Share this campaign with other RVers who could be interested in this book and project!

Have a related product or service you'd like considered for inclusion in our book or content? Be in touch, we are open to receiving review products. 

And of course, help us spread the word!  Share this campaign with other RVers who could be interested in this book and project!

story:
Defenders of the Cross: The Six is a Fantasy book that pits heroes of Planet Junon against the evil that lurks in this Solar System. It starts off with the tale of six warriors who band together to fight against Demons that have been running a mock in the ruling nation, the Akram Kingdom.

The DOTC project's goal is to generate the funding needed for a print run of the first book and advertisement. With your support, we will be able to get this book into the hands of people who have been looking for heroes much like them.

Fantasy Novels, Stories and Books have been running around since I was young. From Lord of the Rings, Eragon to Harry Potter, everyone of those stories showed the tale of gifted individuals who fought extraordinary odds to save the world and people they care about. Not only do they show us heroes but they also show us strange and mystical lands much like you’ll read about here in Defenders of the Cross.

With your help, I aim to publish and print these kinds of stories.

Principality: The Six revolves heavily around the training of Letron and Quest, former heroes of the Akram Kingdom. Top-ranking warriors in the Kingdom now face off against a new and more malevolent enemy, the demons. Sikuku, one of the leading experts in demon fighting has searched for six warriors that he will train to defeat the Demon swine. He trains to control their abilities and shape their future, Letron finds himself suddenly knocked from his pedestal and faces powerful foes to become Sikuku’s right hand man. The Team of Six, face off creatures and Demons just to show to the people who is a real threat and who is worth facing against.  


The Akram Kingdom has a new army defending them from evil. But the true source of this evil is hidden behind the scenes. Six powerful warriors recruited by the legendary Sikuku have become the vanguard in this secret battle. The world is at war against things that slink and gibber in the darkness, and titans that stride from world to world, sowing madness and death.

It has always been a losing battle for the human side since the demons appeared. Incidents have occurred all over the lands, the six investigate these incidents and face off against demon foes that threaten the safety of the citizens. Even with the odds against them, they still continue to fight,  in an unending nightmare, they fight, and why? For victory, for land, for a political ideal? No, mankind fights for the future of the human race.

Our authors, and many others gather to share the war stories from the eternal struggle against the darkness. This book chronicles these desperate battles fought by The Six. Their training, backstories and rise to greatness. They are the Six warriors that might just save the Akram Kingdom from being consumed by darkness. The last line of defense for the human race.


The project is pretty simple: I want to make physical copies of this book available. We also need advertising to help expand the reach of Defenders of the Cross. It is also needed for the production of even more titles. The initial goal is the funding needed for the initial print run, artwork, advertising and expenses. If we exceed the goal, I will be able to focus on writing and releasing more stories, as well as an anthology of short stories set in the Seven Planets maybe even a game.



BACKER PERKS:

  • Early Bird: You’ll receive a digital download of Principality: The Six. It would look just darling on your preferred e-book-reading device. $1

  • Six!: Not only will you get the digital download of the Principality: The Six, but you’ll also get all FIVE prequels to the book! $5

  • Picture Package: As if adding the prequels was enough, not only will we give you four stunning digital wallpapers of official Defenders of the Cross artwork and let’s not forget the free digital download of Principality: The Six. Your name will be up in the books website as a supporter! $25

  • Hopeful Package: As you guessed here you will received everything from the previous package and an official Defenders of the Cross T-Shirt! $50

  • Faithful Package: You don’t only get to see your name in the website but you will also be in the honorable mentions in the pages of the book. Let’s just remind you, all the previous perks are also included here. $100

  • Book Package: The Six is not some hard to get book, but getting a paperback copy sure is. Getting the Book Package means you will receive the paperback copy before anyone else. Including the Shirt, Wallpapers, Prequels and mentions. $200

  • Celestial Package: A signed paperback copy of Principality: The Six, an amazing T-Shirt, four stunning digital wallpaper artwork, the five prequels and mentions in both book and website. But that isn’t all this backer gets to name their own character. This character's name will be determined by the backer, and they will appear in this - or future - stories in this universe. $350

  • Comic Package: A signed paperback copy isn’t enough, right? Let’s do more, have the prequels, have your T-shirt and let’s give you all Six of the Comic books that will be made after the book is published. $500

  • Entrepreneur Package: First let’s get you a signed paperback copy, the five prequels, T-shirt and all six comics. We know not everyone wants simply stuff, some want to advertise their businesses. So here is a special offer, we are going to name one of the building they go to buy equipment after your business. Talk about advertising right? $700

  • Principality Package: You’ll get it all! YES! YOU WILL GET IT ALL! Everything you see in the perks above, everything and one more special thing for you. You will name a character that will be starring in his own custom fiction that will be side by side with the book. $1000

STRETCH GOALS

5k: MORE TALES OF DEFENDERS OF THE CROSS. This includes bringing the stories to other languages. We would also like to continue the tales of many more heroes, digitally releasing a new story that takes place in the same timeline of the Six. These will focus on continuing the Series and tales of many other heroes in the lands, allowing us to explore a wider variety of backgrounds.

7k: D.O.T.C. SECRET FILES: Compiling concept art, character art, world information, and as many super-secret-super-details as your heart desires. Additionally, we will be trying to make more T-Shirts based on the Characters in the story (as described in this post)!

10k: As funding increases, the bigger and better everything will get. We're going to be able to increase the size of the art book, bringing in more artists to generate content for the book. Also, we'll be working on more Comic Books to bring to you!

15k: Not everyone likes to read, so what about an Audio Book? That is a great idea, but not a regular Audio Book, no! We want it to be EPIC! So with your help we will turn our story just this! We are talking about sound effects, great voice actors, excellent narration and even it’s own orchestral music. Something for the best Audio Book experience.

25k:  So you're saying to yourself, gosh, a digital artbook/infobook sounds neat, but I wish I could play in this world. Well, lucky for you, we have plans to make the Defenders of the Cross Online Adventure Game so you can continue the story in a Virtual World. If we hit this stretch goal, you will be getting to play Defenders of the Cross!

Even if we don't hit these goal, know that it is one of the first big ones that we have in mind post-campaign. Your donations would just make them available sooner rather than later!


So maybe you're saying to yourself hey, yeah, okay, this sounds like something that I'd like to read, but I don't have two pennies to rub together. HOW DO I MAKE SURE THAT MY FUTURE HAS MORE D.O.T.C. BOOKS FULL OF ADVENTURES?

Well, there are several ways that you can help make this thing a reality! If you can't donate, but still want to see Defenders of the Cross make it to print, please shout your support from the proverbial e-hills. You can do this by hitting us up reblog like the wind, heroes.

story:
*See the bottom of the page for info on our Social Media Sharing Contest*

About Madeleine 

Madeleine Berrevoets is the volunteer Garden Coordinator for NB Community Harvest Gardens, automotive technician's apprentice, and college student. She lives in Devon on Fredericton's northside with her daughter Audrey. 
Soon after her daughter was born, Madeleine began volunteering at a midwife's office, where she developed a passion for a strong and healthy start for children by teaching parenting classes. She is also a leader in promoting community gardens and food security in her role as Community Food Mentor. It is Madeleine's interest in food and water security, and local resilience, that led to her accepting a nomination to be the MLA candidate for the Green Party in Fredericton North.

"I live a very active life and am committed to working for a healthy and sustainable community, so pursuing the nomination for the Green Party in Fredericton North is a natural extension of the life I have chosen," said Ms. Berrevoets.

The Fredericton North Campaign 

Madeleine has been involved in green and community issues for years, but with the upcoming legislative election, she became concerned that the voice of the community - young people concerned about the environment, parents concerned with their children's careers and health, and retirees worried about the safety and value of their pensions - would not be represented by the parties that typically govern our province. 
Madeleine decided to become involved in the political process so that she could work for the safety and values of the people of New Brunswick - to oppose corruption and misinformation surrounding vital environmental and economic issues. 
As MLA, Madeleine will work hard to build a strong local economy, create clean green jobs, improve healthcare, modernize transportation, protect pensions, and much more. Madeleine is grateful for the opportunity to help create a green future for New Brunswick.

What We Need 

Running a campaign is difficult and expensive, especially when most of our existing supporters are young, working-class families, or retirees whose pensions are stretched thin by rising living costs, and can't afford to donate thousands of dollars at a time. As a result, we have to be as efficient as possible with every dollar and volunteer hour we can get. We feel that one of the best uses for campaign contributions are centrally-located, high-impact signage and informative flyers that remind voters that the Green Party is here to serve them. 
As such, we'll need - for example:

  • 4' x 8' large signs for selected intersections (approx. $70 ea.)
  • 1.5' x 2' lawn signs for supporters (approx. $10 ea.) 
  • Staging materials and labor for signs (approx. $500 total) 
  • Plus the costs of various rentals, fees, and so on...

But we're not in this for the money. We all have our own full- and part-time jobs, and like you, we prefer to earn our own income. Of the $35,000 maximum amount each candidate is allowed to raise, we're only asking for $15,000. That's just enough to run a modest but effective campaign.

What You Get

As a reward for contributing to Madeleine's campaign, every supporter who enters their full mailing address will receive a Green Party button and a Thank You card. 
To keep things simple, we will be offering only two distinct Perk levels for regular contributors:

  • At $50, contributors will receive a Green Party T-Shirt, allowing them to show their support for the Green Party wherever they go
  • At $100, contributors will receive a Green Party T-Shirt and an invitation to our Post-Election Party at a local pub

As well as special prizes for our Social Media Sharing Contest volunteers!
(See the bottom of this page for Contest details)

We've chosen the "Flexible Funding" fee option for our campaign, so that even if we don't reach our funding goal, we'll still be able to make use of your contributions - it just won't go quite as far. 
And remember, because these donations are TAX DEDUCTIBLE, if you include all of your contact information when donating, you will get 75% of your donation back when you file your taxes. 
That breaks down to: 

Your Contribution | Your Cost  | Tax Credit

$25                              $ 6.25             $18.75

$50                             $12.50            $32.50

$100                           $25.00           $75.00

$250                           $75.00           $175.00

Combined with our the Perks you get for donating, our donors get back more than their actual donation. So you can think of your donation as a loan on which you're collecting interest!

The Difference Your Contribution Makes

We can't change our province without your help. By supporting the Green Party, we will be in a position to help you build the kind of province you really want. For example, many New Brunswickers have been very vocal in calling for:

  • An Innovative Green Jobs Sector
  • A Strong & Diverse Local Economy
  • Responsive Local Government
  • Powerful Pension Protections
  • Community-based Health Services
  • Active & Sustainable Transit Options
  • Accessible & Practical Education Options

With a seat in the Legislature, we will be able to help develop such programs and services, and many more. We will be able to move policy and the development of our beautiful province toward the kind of future you want!

The Challenges

Running against large, established parties means that the Green Party must take innovative approaches to not just canvassing and fundraising, but to campaigning and organizing in general. While the two usual governing parties have virtual armies of experienced volunteers and paid staff, the Green Party must be as flexible and efficient as possible. This means using social technologies, online fundraising and communication tools, and other familiar, yet high impact methods to gain support. This also means that we need regular citizens like you to help out - even just in small ways - wherever and whenever you can, so our collective efforts have a chance against the established power structures in the province. 
To do this, of course, we will need donations. But there are many other ways to contribute to the Green Party's success. Your time and energy is more valuable than just money. 
For example, you could join one of our campaign teams, such as: 

  • Social Media Managers - to share links about Madeleine and the Campaign
  • Crowdfunding Officers - to help our supporters donate to the campaign
  • Foot Canvassers - to meet and speak with the people of Fredericton North
  • Phone Canvassers - to connect with supporters when you can't help in person
  • Event Coordinators - to meet and greet at community events
  • Volunteer Coordinators - to develop campaign strategies across teams

We're also open to any other ideas you might have to help bring your community together, and build a strong campaign and prosperous future. 
If you would like to volunteer, or share your ideas, please contact one of the following volunteers via phone, email or social media: 

Madeleine Berrevoets - Candidate 
292-7646 | madeleine@berrevoets2014.ca | @berrevoets2014 | on.fb.me/1AM0Dj0

Arthur Taylor - Campaign Manager
440-6959 | yorkresilient@gmail.com | @yorkresilient | on.fb.me/1sou4ns 

Julia Hansen - Events Coordinator 
julia.hansen@gmail.com 

In the meantime, please donate whatever you can, share this page with your family, friends and associates, and contact us if you have any comments or questions. Thank you for your support!

AND DON'T FORGET TO USE THE EMBEDDED INDIEGOGO CROWDFUNDING TOOLS FOR EASY, ONE-CLICK SHARING - AND QUALIFY FOR A CHANCE TO WIN OUR SOCIAL MEDIA SHARING CONTEST!

SOCIAL MEDIA SHARING CONTEST
How it works: Each of you makes contact with the top 5 "Connectors" you know - people who are popular and involved in the community. This will be your Sharing Team. Once you have these 5 Contributors, whenever they refer someone via our Sharing Tools, these tools will automatically track who referred the visitor or donor. Each referral AND donation will get that team a Share Point, and the TWO teams with the highest scores will get an EXCLUSIVE  CONTEST PERK after the election, when all money is collected - this could be a pub night, pizza party, bowling trip, gift certificates, charitable donations, etc. The only limit to the reward is how much you share the links, so be creative. 

To help you get the most Share Points, we recommend using a Social Media Scheduling App (such as Buffer, LaterBro or HootSuite) to automate your sharing activities, allowing it to share the campaign link for you, several times per day. 
Also, if one of the Connectors on your list would like to lead their own team, let me know, and I'll make note of their name and those of their teammates.

story:
You can’t outrun the membrane ...

For Tanya turning sixteen sucks. Her former friend Rachel is bullying her, the love of her life doesn’t know she exists and her self-esteem isn’t exactly sky-high. When she gets slimed at a bus stop and finds herself in an alternate universe and faced with another version of herself things go from bad to worse.

Her alternate universe double is cool and confident, if a bit bossy. P — short for Princess because in Tanya’s eyes she is one — is part of an organization called Resist. Trained in tactical defense, Resist is preparing for an invasion by the Others. But are the Others really mobilizing to take over P’s universe?

On the other side of the membrane, who can Tanya trust to make it back to her universe alive?

 

Why support Membrane?

There’s nothing like being able to support an author, whether they’re already a favourite of yours or someone that you’re just discovering. We love Membrane and we know that you will too. By supporting this campaign you will help us with some of the bigger costs of publishing the book (see below). The number one reason to support the campaign? The chance to get your hands on some exclusive swag of course!

 

What you’ll get.

Along with getting a chance to pre-order Membrane, you’ll be able to opt in to some pretty cool Fierce swag, depending on the level. All of the things available through our Indiegogo campaign are limited editions and only available here. From signed postcards to Fiercelings to Fierce sling bags there’s some great stuff up for grabs.

 

Where your donations will go.

Here’s a breakdown of where your money will go:

  • $645 will go towards the printing of Membrane for the launch.
  • $500 will be to cover the cost of the cover.
  • $375 will go towards editing and proofing of the book.
  • $800 will be for advertising and promotional costs.

Any additional money above and beyond our goal will go to additional advertising and promotions.

 

How else can you support our campaign?

Spread the word! Know someone who loves reading? Or maybe you have a friend who collects cool swag. Let your friends and family know about our campaign.

story:
Well, what is this all about?

Hi, and welcome to dreamcircle (with a lower case d, we'll have you know). We're a wing of insurgent cool cats all the way from Fox & Raven Publishing, and we're on a mission to get books into the hands of every underprivileged South African - for FREE.

Now, this is our first double-book donation. Our goal for this campaign is to donate 100 copies of Ravensmoot: an anthology of speculative fiction short stories to public libraries and schools in disadvantaged communities across South Africa.

And this is where you come in. The bottom line is that most South Africans simply cannot afford books. As book-lovers, this saddens us. So we're doing something about it, and we hope you'll join in too.

The premise is simple: by donating to this campaign, you'll secure an ebook of Ravensmoot for yourself, and sponsor a print version of the book to a community that needs literature!

We've set our goal at $1000 - that's $10 per book. For every $10 we receive more than that, we'll simply donate another copy of Ravensmoot – and that's all there is to it.

story:
Our Story

Hur Publishing is a brand new indie Canadian publisher based out of Montreal and Vancouver. We make beautiful print books in limited editions, because we believe the book is a form of art. The writing we publish is quirky, smart, and carefully crafted. Last year, we published our first book, Dragon Problems, a charming picture book by Chris Carrier. In the spring of 2011, we will release Small, Stunted Ways, a book of poetry by Cynara Geissler, a young and very talented Canadian author whose work we are thrilled and honoured to publish.


The Impact

In the long run, Hur wants to become a stable, self-sufficient indie publisher with a diverse list of high-quality titles. In the short term, we want to make Small, Stunted Ways a full-colour book on luxurious stock, we want to produce a small batch of hand-bound editions, and we want to pay our starving author. With your help, we can publish the work of a talented and deserving author, create a work of art, and lay another stone in the foundation of our new company.

What We Need & What You Get

With your backing, we can:
  • Pay our printers' bills. It's not cheap to print a book, especially in short runs, and the more funding we have, the better the materials we can print with.
  • Pay our author. We all know it's nearly impossible to make a living writing books, but we would love to help her buy some groceries, at least.
  • Throw a party to launch the book this spring. After all your help, we'd love to introduce you to Cynara, give her a venue to hold a reading, and give you a chance to get your beautiful new books signed.

If you can put $30 towards this cause, you'll get a copy of your own. For $75, you get a hand-bound edition (check out our website for a look at our handmade books). And if you sign over the full $5000, you get our firstborn child.*

*Not a guarantee.

Other Ways You Can Help

Help us spread the word! Tweet this, Facebook it, blog about it, Tumble it like the kids are doing these days.

story:
Who am I?

My name is Kali Meister and I want to publish a cross-genre anthology of original work. 

In 2000 I began a journey of self-discovery with the goal of becoming the person I wanted to be. I finished an undergraduate degree in psychology with minors in performance and creative writing, and I’ve completed a Master of Fine Arts degree in creative writing. My first full-length play was a finalist at a major playwriting festival. 

I am a woman with much knowledge and experience to share. I am a survivor of rape and violence. I am, however, neither a licensed therapist nor a crime statistic. I am a comedianne and confessional writer.

What I need.


I need $2000.00 to self publish my anthology. I am going to publish through Old Moon Academic Press in Maryville, Tennessee. 

The money will cover ISBN, bar coding, 6x9 professional layout, color cover, binding and paper, interior black and white photography, and shipping. 

Any money made over my $2000.00 budget will go toward a second edition printing. 

All who donate and include an address will get a letter thanking them for their personal support. 

Feel free to check out my personal website and this lovely blog written by Kelly Robinson about my last writing workshop.

http://www.kalimeister.com

http://bookdirtblog.blogspot.com/2013/07/what-i-learned-in-sex-writing-class-and.html
